Wyoming and the nation have lost one of the most consequential public servants of our time. Whether he was serving as mayor of Gillette, in the Wyoming Legislature, or in the U.S. Senate, you could not have asked for a stronger champion for Wyoming and our country than Mike Enzi.
Both President Obama’s director and deputy director of the Bureau of Land Management have serious concerns about Tracy Stone-Manning leading the agency. Senate Democrats should listen to them
Please join Bobbi and me in praying for our dear friend Mike Enzi, his wife Diana, and their entire family.

.@CheFrontierDays celebrates its 125th anniversary and its thousands of community volunteers who have worked hard to make it the best yet. From the Grand Parade to the Rodeo, it’s a wonderful way to honor our western legacy.

July 24, 2021 marks the National Day of the American Cowboy. The American cowboy symbolizes the spirit, values and traditions that people in Wyoming cherish most. Bobbi and I are excited to celebrate it in Wyoming at @CheFrontierDays.

The Senate unanimously passed @SenLummis & my bipartisan resolution to make July 24, 2021 the National Day of the American Cowboy. This day is a tribute to the hard-working men and women that helped establish the American West.

How can the men & women who work at @BLMNational respect Tracy Stone-Manning knowing she threatened their colleagues at the @forestservice? Tracy Stone-Manning should never be the director of the Bureau of Land Management.

It’s hard to imagine a nominee more disqualified than Tracy Stone-Manning. She collaborated with eco-terrorists, she lied to the Senate, and she continues to harbor extremist views most Americans find reprehensible.
Tracy Stone-Manning is indisputably disqualified to lead @BLMNational.

Tracy Stone-Manning is unfit to oversee the public lands of the United States. For years, she covered up for eco-terrorists who spiked trees that can cause significant harm to firefighters & loggers. The Energy Committee will vote on her today & every Republican will vote no.

Biden’s #NordStream2 deal with Germany is a grave mistake. Paving the way for Russia and Germany to complete this pipeline puts a stranglehold on Europe. Protecting this Russian trap is not in our national security interest.
The Democrats seem determined to bankrupt America and middle class Americans are going to end up paying for their liberal wish list.

Democrats’ reckless spending means more inflation & higher costs of gas, goods & groceries. It also means more worker shortages & more debt. Democrats did enough damage with their last spending blowout. The new spending spree is twice as big & the timing is even worse.

This past month 188,000 illegal immigrants came to the United States. President Biden’s solution is amnesty for illegal immigrants and to make America into one big sanctuary city. This is one of the many things Democrats are trying to hide in this reckless spending and tax bill.
I’ve talked to all 50 Republicans in the United States Senate. We are united in voting against Tracy Stone-Manning because of her past behavior and lying to the Senate. That has to have consequences.
The Democrats seem to be determined to bankrupt America with this reckless tax and spending spree. It’s radical, extreme, dangerous and scary because the American people will end up paying for it.
Wrote in @USATODAY about how @POTUS must withdraw Tracy Stone-Manning’s nomination to lead @BLMNational if he’s serious about domestic terrorism.

The Democrats’ $3.5 trillion bill is a massive expansion of government taxes, spending, and regulations. No idea is too radical, no cost is too high. If you think inflation is bad now, it’s going to get a lot worse.

The American Nuclear Infrastructure Act will strengthen both America’s energy & national security. It supports the continued operation of America’s existing reactors & sets the stage to deploy advanced nuclear technologies like the Natrium reactor coming to Wyoming.

This letter from the Forest Service lead investigator confirms Tracy Stone-Manning lied to our Senate Committee. She has no business leading @BLMNational. @POTUS must withdraw her nomination & if he does not, the Senate must vote it down.

I am grateful to the lead investigator for providing the committee with all of the facts of the case. Not only did Tracy Stone-Manning collaborate with eco-terrorists, she also helped plan the tree spiking in Clearwater National Forest.

The $3.5 trillion proposal is the Democrats’ freight train to socialism. The American people are going to end up paying for it through massive tax increases, record inflation, and expensive regulations.

Hosted a press conference today on the letter sent by myself, Leader McConnell & 24 other senators about the public health threat at our southern border. By ending #Title42, Pres. Biden is about to take a very bad situation at the border & make it worse.
The people are paying the price when they buy groceries and fill up their gas tanks. #Bidenflation is hurting American families.

President Biden has undone the successful border policies of the previous administration. He has had six months to fix the crisis at our southern border, but under his leadership it is only getting worse.

The number of illegal immigrants coming across the border each month is at a record high. Many are COVID-19 positive. Tomorrow, @SenateGOP members will send a letter to Pres. Biden reminding him that his job is to protect the American people.
The United States supports the Cuban people in their fight for freedom. The authoritarian regime’s suppression of its people must end. Freedom will always win. #SOSCuba #PatriaYVida
Happy 131st birthday Wyoming! On July 10, 1890, Wyoming became the 44th state to join the Union. Bobbi and I love calling this beautiful state home.
ICYMI: “Biden’s Monkeywrencher” - @KimStrassel writes in today’s @WSJ about the disturbing story of nominee Tracy Stone-Manning and Earth First!
MSNBC: Biden Official Calls Stone-Manning Nomination a “Massive Vetting Failure” by the White House.

Nowhere are Americans feeling the pain more than at the pump. Gasoline prices have spiked about 70 cents per gallon since Pres. Biden was inaugurated. They will only continue to climb. That’s the high price of bad policy choices.
Tracy Stone-Manning fully endorsed her husband’s call to action that homes in the forest should be allowed to burn. He even called it a “satisfying justice.” That’s dangerous and disturbing.

Cody, Wyoming sure knows how to put on an #IndependenceDay celebration. Bobbi & I always look forward to participating in the parades, Freedom Celebration, and the @CodyStampede rodeo. We were delighted to be joined by @SenLummis in what has become an annual #4thofJuly tradition.
Bobbi and I wish everyone a happy #IndependenceDay! God bless the USA!

Cody always does a phenomenal job honoring our nation’s veterans. At today’s Freedom Celebration, we honored veterans from across Wyoming. It’s fitting that we pay tribute to those who fought for our freedom this #IndependenceDay weekend.
The 102nd @CodyStampede parade is the perfect way to kick off #FourthofJuly weekend celebrations in Wyoming. Bobbi and I look forward to attending the rodeo tonight.

In @FoxNews oped, I write about how US energy independence is vital and how Pres. Biden's policies could destroy it. This #FourthofJuly, drivers will pay almost a dollar more per gallon than they did last year. That’s the high price of bad policy choices.

Pres. Biden has surrendered our energy independence. We’ve gone from energy dominance to energy dependence. This Fourth of July weekend, Americans will pay much more for gas than they did last year because of the policies of this administration.

You get dizzy watching Pres. Biden tie himself into knots on #infrastructure as he tries to tell everybody what they want to hear. Democrats are saying you're not getting any physical infrastructure unless we get free child care, free college tuition & so-called climate justice.

As we say in Wyoming, there is no sense shooting yourself in the foot & that is what the Biden admin wants to do with this global tax plan. They want to do it so they can raise taxes on American companies & families. All of this will make our nation less competitive, not more.
Businesses are investing in cleaner technologies because they see a global market for them. Without strong intellectual property protections, those investments will vanish.
Wrote in @NewsweekOpinion today on the coming Biden climate intellectual property crisis. Intellectual property rights are the bedrock of U.S. research & development.

Tracy Stone-Manning lied to the Senate ENR Committee by claiming the tree spiking was “alleged” & that she was never investigated. Now, we have confirmation that neither of those things are true. @POTUS must withdraw her nomination.

This investigator has confirmed what I have been saying. Tracy Stone-Manning collaborated with eco-terrorists who had booby-trapped trees with metal spikes. She mailed the threatening letter for them and she was part of the cover-up.

Joined @MariaBartiromo this morning on @FoxNews to discuss the future of the bipartisan infrastructure deal and how Pres. Biden slashing the defense and homeland security budget makes the U.S. more vulnerable to enemies.

The Blue Envelope Health Fair and @WYHealthFairs teamed up to offer affordable health and wellness screenings in Casper today. Big thanks to @CasperWYFireEMS for participating in this important event for the community.

The Supreme Court has upheld the law by defending hardship relief for small refineries under the #RFS. Congress recognized that small refineries would not have the capacity to comply with the nation’s biofuel mandate so it deliberately provided this relief.

My legislation will fix aging irrigation systems and storage infrastructure so that Americans have access to a clean, reliable supply of water. It will give the @usbr the tools it needs to better manage water in the West.
Water is the lifeblood of everything we do in Wyoming. From cattle ranching to energy exploration to recreation, it’s critical to our lives and our livelihoods.
The Democrats' election takeover bill was defeated yesterday for all the right reasons. It was designed to make it easier for Democrats to cheat so that they would never lose an election again.

Today we celebrate our nation’s flag. A symbol of freedom, patriotism, and the ability to overcome any obstacle. May we never forget to honor those who have died to ensure that our flag continues to fly. #flagday

This year’s @WyoBoysState delegates are gearing up for a week of government education and leadership development. Thanks to the Boys State committee for the opportunity to speak to these bright young men on the program’s first night in Laramie.

Congratulations to Mills as they celebrate becoming a First Class City. It was wonderful to be a part of their 100th Anniversary Celebration during their annual Summer Fest. Thank you to Mayor Coleman and the City of Mills for inviting me to be a part of this remarkable event.

Thank you to the Wyoming Shriners for hosting the 48th annual @wyoshrinebowl in Casper. These athletes came together to raise money for a great cause. It was wonderful to see the stands full of support for these Wyoming kids and families.

The WY Leadership Education and Development (L.E.A.D.) program has done an amazing job training & developing leaders in Wyoming’s ag communities. Enjoyed visiting with this year’s class from across the state who are in Washington this week for their national government seminar.

Republicans are ready to work with Democrats on a responsible, targeted infrastructure plan that truly meets the needs of America, without adding the burdens of higher taxes, more federal debt, & job-killing regulations.

.@POTUS has made it clear he has no intention of agreeing to a plan that addresses core #infrastructure. In return for our multiple, significant offers to invest in our roads, bridges, ports, airports, & waterways, the president continues to seek a massive tax and spend plan.

Wyoming agriculture is at the heart of our communities. Thanks to our ranchers, Wyoming has a strong and sustainable future. It was great to join the @WY_StockGrowers today in Sheridan at their summer convention and help celebrate the @WYBeefCouncil’s 50th anniversary.

Tragic news today with the loss of @ForestService Smokejumper Tim Hart of Cody. We owe so much to brave firefighters like Tim who put their lives on the line every day to protect people and property. Our prayers are with his family.

The country is going to continue to depend on Wyoming energy for decades and decades to come. This is another way to diversify our already strong energy economy.

All across Wyoming, communities came together this #MemorialDay to pay tribute to those who made the ultimate sacrifice in service to our country. We will never forget. God bless Wyoming and God bless the USA.
As we observe Memorial Day, Bobbi and I join everyone in Wyoming in remembering the men and women who have sacrificed everything to keep us safe and free. #MemorialDay
